Class ArchiveController

java.lang.Object
com.laoluade.ingestor.ao3.controllers.ArchiveController
@RestController public class ArchiveController extends Object

This class configures where different services can be reached through the server REST API.

This class uses a mix of GetMapping and PostMapping, including a GET request to start a live information session. Any external application using the live info service is expected to manually subscribe to the websocket the Archive Server exposes.

  • Method Details

    • getArchiveIngestorTestData

      @GetMapping("/api/v1") public ArchiveServerTestData getArchiveIngestorTestData()

      This method returns test data to ensure the API is reachable.

      Spring Boot attaches this method to the /api/v1 endpoint and formats the response as JSON.

      Returns:
      ArchiveServerTestData that is formatted into JSON by Spring Boot.

    • getArchiveServerSpecData

      @GetMapping("/api/v1/spec") public ArchiveServerSpecData getArchiveServerSpecData()

      This method returns specification data about the Archive Server.

      Spring Boot attaches this method to the /api/v1/spec endpoint and formats the response as JSON.

      Returns:
      ArchiveServerSpecData that is formatted into JSON by Spring Boot.

    • parseChapter

      @PostMapping("/api/v1/parse/chapter") public ArchiveServerResponseData parseChapter(@RequestBody ArchiveServerRequestData request)

      This method accepts a chapter parsing request formatted as a ArchiveServerRequestData object and returns a confirmation that the request was accepted or rejected.

      Spring Boot attaches this method to the /api/v1/parse/chapter endpoint, creates an ArchiveServerRequestData object from the POST request body, and formats the response as JSON.

      Parameters:
      request - The POST request body, formatted into an ArchiveServerRequestData object.
      Returns:
      ArchiveServerResponseData that is formatted into JSON by Spring Boot.

    • parseStory

      @PostMapping("/api/v1/parse/story") public ArchiveServerResponseData parseStory(@RequestBody ArchiveServerRequestData request)

      This method accepts a story parsing request formatted as a ArchiveServerRequestData object and returns a confirmation that the request was accepted or rejected.

      Spring Boot attaches this method to the /api/v1/parse/story endpoint, creates an ArchiveServerRequestData object from the POST request body, and formats the response as JSON.

      Parameters:
      request - The POST request body, formatted into an ArchiveServerRequestData object.
      Returns:
      ArchiveServerResponseData that is formatted into JSON by Spring Boot.

    • getSessionInformation

      @GetMapping("/api/v1/parse/session/{sessionId}") public ArchiveServerResponseData getSessionInformation(@PathVariable String sessionId)

      This method retrieves session information based on the session ID specified in the content-addressable URL.

      Spring Boot attaches this method to the /api/v1/parse/session/{sessionId} endpoint.

      Spring Boot pulls the session ID from the requested URL, passes it to the top-level archive service, and formats the response as JSON.

      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID to retrieve information for.
      Returns:
      ArchiveServerResponseData that is formatted into JSON by Spring Boot.

    • getSessionInformationLive

      @GetMapping("/api/v1/parse/session/{sessionId}/live") public ArchiveServerResponseData getSessionInformationLive(@PathVariable String sessionId) throws InterruptedException

      This method starts a live websocket feed that regularly publishes updates on a running parsing session. A confirmation response is sent back.

      The session that is chosen is dependent on the session ID specified in the content-addressable URL.

      Spring Boot attaches this method to the /api/v1/parse/session/{sessionId}/live endpoint.

      Spring Boot pulls the session ID from the requested URL, passes it to the top-level archive service, and formats the response as JSON.

      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID to retrieve information for.
      Returns:
      ArchiveServerResponseData that is formatted into JSON by Spring Boot.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the Thread.sleep() line in ArchiveWebsocketService.runLiveSessionFeed() is interrupted.

    • cancelSession

      @GetMapping("/api/v1/parse/session/{sessionId}/cancel") public ArchiveServerResponseData cancelSession(@PathVariable String sessionId)

      This method cancels a running session using the session ID specified in the content-addressable URL. A confirmation response is sent back.

      Spring Boot attaches this method to the /api/v1/parse/session/{sessionId}/cancel endpoint.

      Spring Boot pulls the session ID from the requested URL, passes it to the top-level archive service, and formats the response as JSON.

      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID to retrieve information for.
      Returns:
      ArchiveServerResponseData that is formatted into JSON by Spring Boot.
